00:00 James Gunn: Updates on the DCU's Upcoming Projects
The future of the DCU has plenty to be excited about: In an interview with the trade magazine Variety, James Gunn and Peter Safran gave an update on their upcoming film and series projects. These include the "Teen Titans" live-action film adaptation, "The Penguin" season 2 and "The Batman 2" with Robert Pattinson.

04:09 It's Official: John Lithgow Plays Dumbledore in the Harry Potter Series!
The first significant casting for the highly anticipated "Harry Potter" series is now official: "Conclave" actor John Lithgow will play the iconic role of Albus Dumbledore.
